Home About Contact Login Register
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navigation', templateUrl: './navigation.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navigation.component.css'] }) export class NavigationComponent { constructor(public authService: AuthService) {} handleLogout(): void { this.authService.logout(); } }
